projectOverview.description: An AI-powered career discovery platform that uses voice-based onboarding to understand users, then leverages multi-agent analysis to match them with ideal career paths and provide actionable recommendations.
projectOverview.targetAudience: Students, recent graduates, and early-career professionals seeking clarity on career direction

purposeAndGoals.problemStatement: Young professionals struggle to identify suitable career paths due to limited exposure, information overload, and lack of personalized guidance. Traditional career assessments are text-heavy and impersonal.
purposeAndGoals.solution: A conversational AI that interviews users via voice to understand their skills, personality, passions, goals, and values - then uses multi-agent AI to analyze this data and recommend matching careers with percentage fit scores.
keyObjectives: Enable natural voice-based career discovery interviews
Provide AI-analyzed career recommendations with match percentages
Display career recommendations in a clear, actionable format

primaryPersona.description: College student or recent graduate unsure about career direction, tech-comfortable, prefers interactive experiences over reading lengthy assessments
useCases: Complete voice onboarding to share background and interests
View ranked career recommendations with match percentages
Explore individual career details to understand fit

frontend.reasoning: Aligns with your preferred stack, excellent React ecosystem, server components for performance, seamless API route integration for ElevenLabs signed URLs

API routes handle ElevenLabs auth token generation

technicalArchitecture.systemDesign: Three-tier architecture: (1) Next.js frontend handles UI and ElevenLabs voice sessions, (2) Python/FastAPI backend runs SpoonOS agents and orchestrates career analysis, (3) Convex serves as real-time database shared by both. Frontend calls Python backend via REST for agent workflows, Python writes results to Convex via HTTP actions, frontend subscribes to Convex for real-time updates.
technicalArchitecture.apiStructure: Next.js API Routes: POST /api/elevenlabs/signed-url (generate auth for voice session), POST /api/onboarding/complete (trigger agent pipeline). Python FastAPI: POST /agents/analyze (run SpoonOS pipeline), GET /agents/status/{jobId} (check processing status). Convex HTTP Actions: POST /api/convex/save-profile, POST /api/convex/save-recommendations (called by Python backend).
thirdPartyIntegrations: ElevenLabs Conversational AI - Voice agent for onboarding interviews
OpenAI/Anthropic API - LLM backbone for SpoonOS agents

uiUxConsiderations.designApproach: Clean, minimal interface with card-based layouts. Voice interaction should feel like talking to a career counselor, not using software. Processing states show friendly animations. Career cards are scannable with clear match percentages.
keyUserFlows: Sign up → First-time onboarding detection → Voice interview (5-7 questions) → Processing animation → Career recommendations
Return user → Dashboard with saved recommendations → Click career card → View details
Redo onboarding → Settings → 'Retake Interview' → Voice flow → New recommendations
uiUxConsiderations.styleGuidelines: Use shadcn/ui components. Primary color: calming blue/purple gradient. Large, readable typography. Generous whitespace. Voice interface shows audio waveform visualization during conversation. Cards have subtle shadows and hover states.
